name: Honeycomb Candle
description:
Our cozy beeswax candle jar is BACK and in a bigger size!

SCENT PROFILE - This candle has the pure scent of honey that comes from pure beeswax.

CANDLE CARE - For best results, allow the candle to burn to the edge each time it burns. This can take up to 4 hours. This ensures that the candle will burn evenly and won’t create a “tunnel” of beeswax.

Trim the wick before each burn. You can trim the wick by pinching off the charred part with your fingers. This ensures your wick won’t burn too fast.

The candle comes in an 8-ounce amber glass jar with a lid. It has a burn time of approximately 30 hours when cared for.

name: Spiced Anise Candle
description:
Our herb-infused tallow candles were the first on the market, utilizing scents from herbs and spices without using essential oils.

Our NEW spiced anise tallow and beeswax candle is a proprietary blend of herbs and spices. The ingredients are slowly infused with the tallow and beeswax to produce a yummy finished product! This candle was inspired by my grandpa and his love for black licorice, and all the positive memories I have associated with that scent.

They will not fill the room quite like store-bought candles will, but they have a warm scent and are totally non-toxic.

SCENT PROFILE - This candle has a cozy spice aroma with a hint of anise, clove, and black licorice. The smell is warm and cozy, and has a deeper scent profile than our other candles. We have had people test the candle who hate black licorice and said the scent is pleasant!

CANDLE CARE - For best results, allow the candle to burn to the edge each time it burns. This can take up to 4 hours. This ensures that the candle will burn evenly and won’t create a “tunnel” of beeswax.

Trim the wick before each burn. You can trim the wick by pinching off the charred part with your fingers. This ensures your wick won’t burn too fast.

The candle comes in an 8-ounce amber glass jar with a lid.

name: Sunshine - Summer Herbal Tea
description:
This tart and tangy tea was formulated to capture the vibrance of summer. The herbs and fruits work together to provide needed nutrients, digestive support, and a refreshing addition to your day. The herbs provide much-needed vitamins and minerals to support the body on hot day!

Enjoy this tea on a daily basis or as needed.

We recommend savoring a cup during moments of solitude to allow your body to relax and mindfully enjoy each sip.

INGREDIENTS: (all wildcrafted or organic)

Hibiscus - helps to lower blood pressure, anti-inflammatory, high in vitamin C

Red Raspberry Leaf - aids in the oxygenation of the cells, strengthens the uterine muscles, and helps to relieve and prevent morning sickness.

Lemongrass - a natural diuretic which helps to flush out toxins and reduce bloating.

Dried tart cherries - Tangy and rich in nutrients that can promote calm in the body

Lemon Peel -is aromatic and bitter, stimulating appetite and digestion.

Each jar contains 2 ounces of tea, or 10-12 servings, depending on how strong you like your tea. 

Or each bag contains 4 ounces of tea.
